snippet.title: Soulmask - Official Survive Trailer
snippet.description:
Soulmask is a sandbox game that prioritizes an authentic survival experience. The game supports single-player, LAN, and online multiplayer gaming modes.  (Private server is allowed.) PVP and PVE come down to players' preferences and play styles.

As the "last one" blessed with the mysterious mask, players will grapple for survival in a primitive land steeped in mysterious faiths, carving out a path to ascendance. Start from nothing, explore, build, recruit tribesmen to fortify your clan, and ultimately unravel the mysterious truths hidden behind the civilizations of this world.

On February 5th, play the Soulmask demo during Steam Next Fest! For more latest updates, add Soulmask on your steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2646460?utm_source=IGN01 and join our official Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/eVsURRrKU3 now!

#IGN #Gaming #Soulmask
